subsc: General education sector,Central government administration,Health,Ports, waterways and shipping,Banking
trustfund:
TF021556-FINANCIAL SECTOR ADJUSTMENT
            CREDIT (FSAC),TF021109-TANZANIA IBRD DEBT SERVICE (5TH DIMENSION),TF021553-STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT CREDIT,TF020235-PHRD-FINANCIAL TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE

abstracts.cdata!:
The assessment of outcome is
            satisfactory, sustainability likely, and institutional
            development impacts substantial. Lessons reinforce the
            importance of political commitment, key to the progress made
            in implementing the project, particularly given its broad
            scope, and complexity. This commitment helped strengthen
            cooperation between the Government, and the Bank, and
            provided the basis to focus assistance on redressing
            technical, and capacity constraints. As such, modifications
            of the social sector reforms, were feasible because of
            political decision, with initiating actions for a much
            stronger decentralization than initially envisaged.
            Furthermore, technical assistance served to redesign the
            program accordingly, and adopt a phased implementation plan,
            namely because of Government commitments, which also
            facilitated implementation of reforms by sector departments.
            However, the sequencing of actions, and implementation time
            frame may have been overly optimistic, although it did serve
            a purpose in conveying a sense of urgency. For instance,
            institutional, and structural measures had a medium-term
            perspective, while the horizon of the project was mush
            shorter; and, by the Bank taking into account this factor,
            providing flexibility in the inclusion of floating tranches,
            it allowed the Government a measure of control in timing its
            actions, in spite of the Government's inexperience in
            timing tranche releases, which are linked directly to budget
            financing. Thus a more realistic time frame will be provided
            under the follow-up operation, by building on the
            medium-term perspective of the Government's program.
